titleStmt.title: Frank Krebs and Pat Daughtery v. King County. Order granting the petition

bibl.title: Frank Krebs and Pat Daughtery v. King County. Order granting the petition
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: OIn The District Court of the Third Judicial of Washingto Territory holding terms at Seattle in County of King. In the matter of the granting of the petition of Frank Krebs and Pat Daugherty order granting the petition.

On Reading and filing the petition of Frank Krevs and Pat Daugherty dully signed and verified by them, whereby it appears that they are illegally imprisoned and restrained of their liberty by John H. Mc.Graw at the county Jail in the city of Seattle in King County Washington Territoryand stating wherein the illegality consists, from which it appears to me that a writ of Habeas Corpus ought to issue: it is ordered and that a writ of Habeas Corpus issue out of and under the seal of the District Court of the third Judicial District of Washington Territory in and for the county of King, and directed to the said John H. Mc. Graw commanding him to have the bodies of the said Frank Krebs and Pat Daugherty before me onthe court room of the court house in said county on the 11th day of Oct 1889 at the hour of 1.00 PM of that day to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the said Frank Krebs and Pat Daugherty together with the same time and cause of their detention, and to have them and there the said writ. C. H. Hanford Judge.
